item.title: 解决Homebrew下载极其“快速”问题
item.description: 解决Homebrew下载极其“快速”问题 What? Homebrew是什么？都2020年了。 我也不知道！ 当你运行 brew update，你会发现你可以看着屏幕一整天。 # 运行过程。。。 brew update --verbose Checking if we need to fetch /usr/local/Homebrew... Checking if we need to fetch /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/caskroom/homebrew-fonts... Fetching /usr/local/Homebrew... Checking if we need to fetch /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-cask... Checking if we need to fetch /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-core... Fetching /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-cask... Fetching /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-core... remote: Enumerating objects: 337, done. remote: Counting objects: 100% (337/337), done. remote: Compressing objects: 100% (88/88), done. remote: Total 298 (delta 221), reused 287 (delta 210), pack-reused 0 Receiving objects: 100% (298/298), 50.
